Wisdom: انْتِبَاهُ الْعُيُونِ لَا يَنْفَعُ مَعَ غَفْلَةِ الْقُلُوبِ
enWisdom: The wakefulness of eyes is of no benefit with the negligence of hearts

Wisdom: خُلُوُّ الْقَلْبِ مِنَ التَّقْوَى يَمْلَؤُهُ مِنْ فِتَنِ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: When the heart is empty of God-wariness, it gets filled with the lures of this world

Wisdom: سَمْعُ الْأُذُنِ لَا يَنْفَعُ مَعَ غَفْلَةِ الْقَلْبِ
enWisdom: Hearing with the ear does not benefit when the heart is heedless
The worst of hearts is the one that doubts in its faith

Wisdom: عِظَمُ الْجَسَدِ وَطُولُهُ لَا يَنْفَعُ إِذَا كَانَ الْقَلْبُ خَاوِياً
enWisdom: The strong muscles of the body and its height are of no benefit if the heart is empty
One whose heart is dead enters the fire [of hell]

Wisdom: وَقِرَ قَلْبٌ لَمْ يَكُنْ لَهُ أُذُنٌ وَاعِيَةٌ
enWisdom: Deaf is the heart that does not have an attentive ear
